mapper.sql: id, lc_templ_bid, lc_templ_version, init_state, description, lc_phase_templ_bid, lc_phase_templ_version, phase_init_state, phase_description, model_code, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, tenant_id
mapper.select: select o.id, o.lc_templ_bid, t1.current_version as lc_templ_version, o.init_state, o.description, o.lc_phase_templ_bid, t2.current_version as lc_phase_templ_version, o.phase_init_state, o.phase_description, o.model_code, o.created_time, o.updated_time, o.created_by, o.updated_by, o.tenant_id from cfg_object_life_cycle o left join cfg_life_cycle_template t1 on o.lc_templ_bid = t1.bid left join cfg_life_cycle_template t2 on o.lc_phase_templ_bid = t2.bid where o.model_code = #{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select o.id, o.lc_templ_bid, t1.current_version as lc_templ_version, o.init_state, o.description, o.lc_phase_templ_bid, t2.current_version as lc_phase_templ_version, o.phase_init_state, o.phase_description, o.model_code, o.created_time, o.updated_time, o.created_by, o.updated_by, o.tenant_id from cfg_object_life_cycle o left join cfg_life_cycle_template t1 on o.lc_templ_bid = t1.bid left join cfg_life_cycle_template t2 on o.lc_phase_templ_bid = t2.bid where o.model_code in
#{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into cfg_object_life_cycle (bid,lc_templ_version,lc_templ_bid, init_state, description, lc_phase_templ_bid, lc_phase_templ_version, phase_init_state, phase_description, model_code, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by) values (#{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lcTemplVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lcTemplBid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lcPhaseTemplBid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lcPhaseTemplVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phaseInitState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phaseDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cfg_object_life_cycle set lc_templ_bid = #{lcTemplBid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, init_state = #{initState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lc_phase_templ_bid = #{lcPhaseTemplBid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phase_init_state = #{phaseInitState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phase_description = #{phaseDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where model_code = #{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
